summary: The Dollar Dominance Act of 2025 proposes the establishment of the Office of Strategic Currency Diplomacy within the Department of State. This office would be responsible for combatting efforts to undermine the US dollar's status as the world's reserve currency. It will focus on partnering with allies, evaluating the implications of virtual assets, aligning foreign policy with national monetary security, and coordinating related programs abroad. The office will advise on policies, develop strategic plans to protect the dollar's preeminence, monitor and counter the adoption of Central Bank Digital Currencies, and engage internationally on virtual assets.
